content: HomeBlogJonathan Stefansky VP, Sales Intelligence Jonathan Stefansky Over the years, Jonathan’s leadership roles have spanned across various industry giants and innovative startups. He began his career at Goldman Sachs, where ultimately, he led the Internet Infrastructure team at the firm. At Akamai, he wore multiple hats, overseeing Network Architecture & Infrastructure while managing a 70-person organization and over $100M budget. Following that role, he transitioned to the Sales & Marketing organization as the head of Strategic Account Development, working with the largest media companies in the world and leading the competitive winback team, which resulted in over 5X in revenue growth. At IDT Global Services, he was a key part of the executive team as CRO & Head of Marketing, growing the organization to over 900 employees and providing meaningful employment for new immigrants to Israel. His entrepreneurial spirit led him to co-found Viewbix, as CEO, he ultimately led the company to a successful acquisition by Algomizer/Gix Technologies. Subsequently, he joined Jeeng as the GM of Messaging, growing revenues by over 600% in 2 years, and was an integral part of the executive team that helped lead it to a $100M acquisition by OpenWeb.
